primary_phone.purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.

sections.authority_name: City of San Diego, Parking Administration

serves.description: Parking citations issued by the City of San Diego for general parking enforcement.

how_to_recognize.notes: City parking citations typically show a numeric citation number; length may vary.

submission_methods.notes: Administrative review requests may be filed online or by mail.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm this is the correct Phase-1 mailing address for City of San Diego parking citations.

verification.verified_source_note: Mailing address and instructions from City of San Diego official site:contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}.

sections.canonical_section_name: Port of San Diego Harbor Police
sections.authority_name: Port of San Diego Harbor Police

serves.description: Parking citations issued on Port of San Diego property by Harbor Police.

how_to_recognize.notes: Port citations may include alphanumeric identifiers and reference the Citation Processing Center.

submission_methods.notes: The Port allows appeals to be submitted online, by mail, or in person at Harbor Police headquarters.

confirm_by_phone.department: Port of San Diego Harbor Police
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm this is the correct address and procedure for Port of San Diego parking citation appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: Appeal mailing address and options confirmed from Port of San Diego citations page:contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}.

serves.description: Parking citations issued on the UC San Diego campus by Transportation Services.

how_to_recognize.notes: UCSD citations generally feature a numeric citation number and UC San Diego branding.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be submitted online; supporting documentation may be mailed to the address below.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the correct address and process for UC San Diego parking citation appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: Mailing address for appeals confirmed from UC San Diego Transportation Services site:contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}.

sections.authority_name: San Diego Community College District Parking Services

serves.description: Parking citations issued on community college district campuses (City, Mesa, Miramar, Continuing Education) within the San Diego Community College District.

how_to_recognize.notes: SDCCD citations use numeric identifiers and reference the districtâ€™s parking services.

submission_methods.notes: Administrative review requests may be submitted online or by mail within 21 days.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm this is the correct mailing address for San Diego Community College District parking citation appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: Mailing address and instructions confirmed from SDCCD Pay or Appeal citation page:contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}.

sections.canonical_section_name: University of San Diego Parking Services

serves.description: Parking citations issued by the University of San Diego on campus property.

how_to_recognize.notes: USD citations typically include a numeric identifier and USD branding.

submission_methods.notes: USD requires all appeals to be submitted online via their parking portal; mail appeals are not accepted.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: University of San Diego only accepts appeals online and does not provide a mailing address for Phase-1 appeals.

confirm_by_phone.department: University of San Diego Parking Services
confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that appeals must be submitted online and verify there is no mailing address for USD parking citations.

verification.verified_source_note: USD website states appeals must be submitted online and does not list a mailing address:contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}.

serves.description: Parking citations issued by San Diego State University Transportation Services on SDSU campus property.

how_to_recognize.notes: SDSU citations generally display a numeric citation number along with SDSU branding.

submission_methods.notes: SDSU instructs appellants to submit appeals online or return the Administrative Review form in person to the parking office; no mailing address is provided for initial appeals.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: SDSU requires appeals to be submitted online or delivered in person to the Parking Office; a mailing address for initial appeals is not provided.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the correct procedure for SDSU citation appeals and verify that no mailing address exists for the initial appeal.

verification.verified_source_note: SDSU appeal process page and administrative review form instruct appellants to submit appeals online or return the form to the parking office; no mailing address provided:contentReference[oaicite:5]{index=5}:contentReference[oaicite:6]{index=6}.

blocking_issues: University of San Diego and SDSU sections lack confirmed mailing addresses for Phase-1 appeals; both require confirmation of online-only or in-person procedures.
known_gaps: Citation number patterns across authorities are based on limited information and have low confidence.
SDSU and USD sections require follow-up phone confirmation to verify appeal routing and absence of mailing addresses.
